levels.subtitle: No integration
levels.description: Basic standalone application with no Nexus integration
examples: Traditional desktop software that saves to shared drive / Nexus Drive

levels.subtitle: Basic integration
levels.description: Application with basic Nexus data schema integration
examples: Basic API connectivity to Nexus services

levels.subtitle: Advanced integration
levels.description: Application with advanced Nexus integration and real-time sync

levels.subtitle: Full integration
levels.description: Complete Nexus ecosystem integration with all features
